verbose_text: During iron sufficiency, the GATA-factor SreA, postulated by bioinformatic analyses to recognize the consensus sequence ATCWGATAA, represses high-affinity iron uptake, including RIA and the siderophore system, to avoid iron toxicity.
evidence: GATA-factor SreA, postulated by bioinformatic analyses to recognize the consensus sequence ATCWGATAA, represses high-affinity iron
